page.title: 19TRAFFIC SURVEY,WIGLEY
page.content: We made a small traffic survey at the roundabout leading to the M27.We counted the vehicles coming on and off the roundabout at each exit.(see table below.) TRAFFIC AT THE WIGLEY ROUNDABOUT ROAD CARS LOR BUSES TOTAL A36 to Salisbury 145 40 1 186 from Salisbury 93 43 0 136 A31 to Romsey 63 10 0 73 from Romsey 80 17 3 100 A36 to Totton 100 24 1 125 from Totton 104 17 0 121 A36 to S'hampton 122 74 1 195 from S'hampton 125 50 1 176 We found that there was most traffic between Salisbury and the motorway leading to Southampton.Most lorries used this route,probably to the docks. We thought that Wigley must be much quieter now. LOR=lorries.
